segments.text: Mark , can you dress the twins for me while I take a shower ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You don't know what you are asking !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please ! You can do it . Their clothes are all laid out on the bed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you referring to KC getting her head stuck in the pant leg ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . That was a bit terrifying for both of us .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't worry ! Today they are wearing dresses !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , in that case , sure ! Uh ... what are these long sock-looking things ?
segments.speaker: S2
